title: Printer's Sample Book, 1879
inscribed:
Front Cover: "Book ll - April 29, 1879"

Back cover: "James Irwin, 241 Atlantic Corp."
creditline: Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts
description: Small notebook with handwritten formulas for dyestuffs for printed textiles. Contains 183 samples of printed fabrics, mostly floral patterns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Printer's Sample Book, 1879.
1879. Medium: cardboard, leather, paper, cotton. Gift of Frederick J. Whitehead from the collection compiled by his father Cornelius Whitehead at the Pacific Print Works of Lawrence, Massachusetts. 1945-55-23.
